nodes.text: A guard-droid was a security droid working at the Armand Isard Correctional Facility. This droid guarded prisoner Tahiri Veila—who was in prison for assassinating Grand Admiral Gilad Pellaeon—when she was brought to see the warden at the Armand Isard Correctional Facility. The droid waited by the door to the office, then when the warden was done talking to Tahiri, he had the droid take her away.
